choose.when: SELECT count(*) FROM purchase_invoice i WHERE i.purchase_invoice_serial LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
SELECT count(*) FROM purchase_invoice i, brand b, items it WHERE i.item_num = it.item_num (+) AND it.brand_num = b.brand_num (+) AND b.brand_name LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
SELECT count(*) FROM purchase_invoice i, supplier sup WHERE i.supplier_num = sup.supplier_num (+) AND sup.supplier_name LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
SELECT count(*) FROM purchase_invoice i WHERE i.purchase_invoice_date LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
SELECT count(*) FROM purchase_invoice i, user_info u WHERE i.user_num = u.user_num (+) AND u.user_name LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, iii.* FROM ( SELECT inv.*, ui.user_name, isk.tp FROM purchase_invoice inv, user_info ui, ( SELECT ii.purchase_invoice_num, SUM(ii.qty * it.unit_price) tp FROM purchase_invoice_item ii, items it WHERE ii.item_num = it.item_num (+) GROUP BY ii.purchase_invoice_num ) isk WHERE inv.user_num = ui.user_num (+) AND inv.purchase_invoice_num = isk.purchase_invoice_num (+) ORDER BY purchase_invoice_date DESC ) iii ORDER BY rnum ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNo } AND #{endNo }

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, iii.* FROM( SELECT it.*,ii.purchase_invoice_num,ii.qty,ii.purchase_invoice_item_num,ou.order_unit, b.brand_name, c.cate_name, inv.purchase_invoice_serial FROM items it, purchase_invoice_item ii, order_unit ou, brand b, category c, purchase_invoice inv WHERE ii.purchase_invoice_num = inv.purchase_invoice_num (+) AND inv.purchase_invoice_serial = #{invoiceSerial} AND ii.item_num = it.item_num (+) AND it.order_unit_num = ou.order_unit_num (+) AND it.brand_num = b.brand_num (+) AND it.cate_num = c.cate_num (+) ORDER BY ii.purchase_invoice_item_num asc )iii ORDER BY rnum )
SELECT recipe_num, recipe_name, recipe_price, classification FROM recipe WHERE recipe_name LIKE '%' || #{recipeName} || '%' ORDER BY recipe_name
SELECT * FROM BRAND ORDER BY BRAND_NUM
SELECT * FROM Supplier ORDER BY Supplier_NUM
SELECT * FROM order_unit ORDER BY order_unit_NUM
SELECT * FROM CATEGORY ORDER BY CATE_NUM
SELECT * FROM ITEMS WHERE ITEM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{itemName} || '%' ORDER BY ITEM_NUM
SELECT * FROM items WHERE ITEM_CODE LIKE '%' || #{itemCode} || '%' ORDER BY ITEM_NUM

SELECT inv.*, ui.user_name ,sup.supplier_name FROM purchase_invoice inv, user_info ui, supplier sup WHERE inv.purchase_invoice_serial= #{invoiceSerial} AND inv.user_num = ui.user_num (+) AND inv.supplier_num = sup.supplier_num (+)
SELECT count(*) cnt FROM purchase_invoice_item where purchase_invoice_num = #{invoiceNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO items ( ITEM_NUM, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, BRAND_NUM, CATE_NUM, ORDER_UNIT_NUM, UNIT_PRICE, USER_NUM, LAST_UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES (items_num_seq.nextval, #{itemCode},#{itemName},#{brandNum},#{cateNum},#{orderUnitNum},#{unitPrice},#{userNum}, SYSDATE)

INSERT INTO purchase_invoice ( purchase_invoice_NUM, purchase_invoice_SERIAL, USER_NUM, purchase_invoice_DATE, SUPPLIER_NUM) VALUES ( purchase_invoice_NUM_SEQ.nextval, #{invoiceSerial},#{userNum},#{invoiceDate},#{supplierNum} )
INSERT INTO purchase_invoice_item ( purchase_invoice_item_num, purchase_invoice_NUM, ITEM_NUM, QTY) VALUES ( INVOICE_ITEM_NUM_SEQ.nextval, #{invoiceNum}, #{itemNum},#{qty} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, iiii.* FROM ( SELECT i.* , ii.qty, ii.purchase_invoice_item_num FROM items i, purchase_invoice_item ii, purchase_invoice inv WHERE ii.purchase_invoice_NUM = inv.purchase_invoice_NUM (+) AND ii.ITEM_NUM = i.ITEM_NUM (+) AND inv.purchase_invoice_SERIAL = #{invoiceSerial} ORDER BY i.ITEM_NUM asc ) iiii ORDER BY rnum )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO purchase_invoice_item (purchase_invoice_ITEM_NUM, purchase_invoice_num, ITEM_NUM, QTY) VALUES (invoice_item_num_seq.nextval,#{invoiceNum},#{itemNum},#{qty})
